mapper.select: SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont7,mem_cont3,num FROM (SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont7,mem_cont3,ROWNUM as num FROM (SELECT no,chef,poster,mem_cont1,mem_cont2,mem_cont7,mem_cont3 FROM chef ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM chef ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) WHERE ROWNUM=1
SELECT no,poster,title,ROWNUM FROM (SELECT no,poster,title FROM recipe ORDER BY no DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <=5

SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount,num FROM (SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount,ROWNUM as num FROM (SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount FROM recipe WHERE no IN ( SELECT no FROM recipe INTERSECT SELECT no FROM recipeDetail ) ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/12.0) FROM recipe WHERE no IN ( SELECT no FROM recipe INTERSECT SELECT no FROM recipeDetail)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recipe WHERE no IN ( SELECT no FROM recipe INTERSECT SELECT no FROM recipeDetail)

SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount,num FROM (SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount,ROWNUM as num FROM (SELECT no,hit,title,poster,chef,link,likecount,replycount FROM recipe WHERE no IN ( SELECT no FROM recipe INTERSECT SELECT no FROM recipeDetail ) AND ${column} LIKE '%'||#{fd}||'%' ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
